name: anandir
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))

stmt.origin: bitr3i(wa(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), w2))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), w2))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), w2))
-| wb(wa(w2, w2), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wa(w2, w2), w2)

|- wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wa(w0, w2), wa(w1, w2)))

comment: Distribution of conjunction over conjunction. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-1995.)
